name: OpenShift Container Platform Enterprise 4.x Installation for Terrafrom 0.12.x- Using Proxy
description: This template will deploy an HA-ready version of OpenShift Container Platform. This template uses Terraform 0.12.x engine.

metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy an enterprise, HA-ready version of OpenShift Container Platform. This template uses Terraform 0.12.x engine.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description: RHEL 7.6 on Infra node, RHCOS 4.x on OCP cluster nodes

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description:
master: vCPU 16, Memory (GB) 32, Disk (GB) 250
worker: vCPU 08, Memory (GB) 16, Disk (GB) 250

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description: This template runs on Terraform 0.12.x engine.
